definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: drop, drip, fig. (esp. of prophet) discourse (NH id.; Targum [[נְטַף]] drop, drip; Syr. nt.ap drip, t.uwpto0 drop (Nö:Syr. Gr. § 105) etc.; Ar. nat.afa id.; Eth. nat’ba: id., nat’afa: colare (stillando), expercolare);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 mpl. [[נׇֽטְפוּ]] Ju Jdg 5:4 + 2 t.; [[נׇטָָּפוּ]] Ju Jdg 5:4; Impf. 3 fs. [[תִּטּׂף]] Job 29:22; 3 mpl. [[יִטּפוּ]] Joe 4:18; 3 fpl. [[תִּטּׂפְנׇה]] Pr 5:3, Ct So 4:11; Pt [[נׁטְפוֹת]] Ct So 5:13; —drop, drip, usu. trans., c. acc., of clouds dropping water ([[מַיִ]]), in storm Ju Jdg 5:4, ‖ heavens v:Jdg 5:4 (obj. om.), Ps 68:9 (id.; all theoph.); of hands dripping myrrh ([[מוֹר]]) Ct So 5:5; in predict. [[יִטְּפוּ עָסִיס]] Joe 4:18 the mts. shall drip must; fig. of (seductive) speech ´[[נׁפֶת תִּטּ]] Pr 5:3 the lips of the strange woman drop honey, so perh. Ct So 4:11 (Bu of kisses); [[מוֹר]] ´[[שִׂפְתוֹתָיו נ]] So 5:13 his lips drip myrrh (perh. of sweet breath). Intrans. only [[עָלֵימוֹ תִּטּׂף מִלָּתִי]] Job 29:22  upon them my speech used to drop.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 mpl. [[וְהִטִּיפוּ]] consec. Am 9:13; Impf. 2 ms. [[תַּטִּיף]] Am 7:16; 1 S. [[אַטִּף]] Mic 2:11; 3 mpl. [[יִטִּיפָוּן]] v:Mic 2:6; 2 mpl. [[תַּטִּיפוּ]] v:Mic 2:6, [[תַּטִּפוּ]] v:Mic 2:6; Pt. [[מַטִּיף]] Mic 2:11; —
drip, [[עָסִיס]] ´[[וְהַטּ]] Am 9:13 and the mts. shall drip must (=

of speech, esp. prophecy (without acc.): c. [[עַל]] against, Am 7:16 (‖[[הִנׇּבֵא]]), c. [[אֶל־]] toward, Ex 21:2 (‖ id.), v:Ex 21:7 (‖ id.); c. [[ל]] concerning Mic 2:11 cf. v:Mic 2:11; —[[אַל־תַּטִּפוּ יַטִּיכָּוּן לאׁ־יַטִּפוּ לָאֵלֶּה]] Mic 2:6 ‘talk not’—so they talk—‘they (rd. ye?) shall not talk of these things’ (where ´[[תַּטּ]], [[יַטִּפוּ]] ref. to prophets).
